peripheral.title: I2C
peripheral.help_text:
I2C (Inter Integrated Circuit) is a communication interface widely used to connect
devices such as microcontrollers, sensors, and serial interface memories. This peripheral provides
an easy-to-use interface, with very simple software programming, and full timing flexibility.
